mismatch_summary:
Mismatch: recommendationservice → productcatalogservice:3550 (Expected: True, Actual: False)
Mismatch: emailservice → redis-cart:6379 (Expected: False, Actual: True)

llm_command:
bash
kubectl apply -n default -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-recommendation-to-productcatalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: recommendationservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalogservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 3550
EOF
output: Error from server (NotFound): networkpolicies.networking.k8s.io "allow-recommendation-to-productcatalog" not found
